Description_lang: Abilities that activate Gust of Mist reduce the cooldown on $?s325197[Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane][Invoke Yul'on, the Jade Serpent] by ${$s2/-1000}.1 sec, and $?s325197[Chi-Ji's Gusts of Mists][Yu'lon's Soothing Breath] healing is increased by |cFFFFFFFF${$s1}.1%|r.

description_blz.en_US: Abilities that activate Gust of Mist reduce the cooldown on Invoke Yul'on, the Jade Serpent by 0.3 sec, and Yu'lon's Soothing Breath healing is increased by 10.0%.
description_blz.es_MX: Las habilidades que activan tu Ráfaga de niebla reducen 0.3 s el tiempo de reutilización de Invocar a Yul'on, la Dragona de jade y la sanación de el Aliento reconfortante de Yu'lon aumenta un 10.0%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Habilidades que ativam Rajada de Brumas reduzem em 0,3 s a recarga de Invocar Yu'lon, a Serpente de Jade e a cura do Sopro Reconfortante de Yu'lon aumenta em 10,0%.
description_blz.de_DE: Fähigkeiten, die 'Nebelschwall' aktivieren, verringern die Abklingzeit von 'Yu'lon die Jadeschlange beschwören' um 0,3 Sek. und die Heilung von Yu'lons 'Beruhigender Atem' ist um 10,0% erhöht.
description_blz.en_GB: Abilities that activate Gust of Mist reduce the cooldown on Invoke Yul'on, the Jade Serpent by 0.3 sec, and Yu'lon's Soothing Breath healing is increased by 10.0%.
description_blz.es_ES: Las facultades que activan Racha de niebla reducen 0,3 s el tiempo de reutilización de Invocar a Yu'lon, el Dragón de Jade, y la sanación de Aliento reconfortante de Yu'lon aumenta un 10,0%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Les techniques qui activent Bourrasque de brume réduisent de 0,3 s le temps de recharge d’Invocation de Yu’lon, le Serpent de jade, et augmentent de 10,0% les soins de Souffle apaisant de Yu’lon.
description_blz.it_IT: Le abilità che attivano Folata di Venti riducono il tempo di recupero di Invocazione: Yu'lon, la Serpe di Giada di 0,3 s e aumentano le cure fornite da Respiro Calmante di Yu'lon del 10,0%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Активирующие "Туманный поток" способности сокращают время восстановления "Призыва Юй-лун, Нефритовой Змеи" на 0,3 сек., а исцеление от "Успокаивающего дыхания" Юй-лун усиливается на 10,0%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 안개 돌풍을 발동시키는 능력이 옥룡 위론의 원령의 재사용 대기시간을 0.3초만큼 감소시키고, 위론의 위안의 숨결의 치유량을 10.0%만큼 증가시킵니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 啟動洶湧迷霧的技能會使召喚玉蛟玉龍的冷卻時間縮短0.3秒，並使玉龍的舒和吐息治療效果提高10.0%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 能够触发迷雾之风的技能会使青龙下凡的冷却时间缩短0.3秒，并且使玉珑的抚慰之息造成的治疗效果提高10.0%。
